akn:content.akn:p: § 9809. Statement of purpose It is the purpose of this part to meet the special economic needs of rural communities or areas with concentrations or substantial numbers of low-income persons by providing support to self-help programs which promote economic development and independence, as a supplement to existing similar programs conducted by other departments and agencies of the Federal Government. Such programs should encourage low-income families to pool their talents and resources so as to create and expand rural economic enterprise. (Pub. L. 97–35, title VI, § 620, Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 493.)
